attributes.action: Fine people who book a vaccination and don’t turn up
attributes.additional_details: There are so many people that truly want to be vaccinated people who don’t turn up to appointments are wasting time and vaccines!
attributes.background: There are hundreds of people booking vaccinations and not turning up for the appointment. Loads of these vaccines go to waste. There should be a fine in place for people who fail to turn up to their appointment without valid reasoning.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565601
